item.title: Comment on The art of the deal by Maria
item.dc:creator: Maria
item.description: I love grey hoodies! This is perfect with my grey Ninja shirt, when I get cold I throw this on and I can still be a Ninja.
item.content:encoded: I love grey hoodies! This is perfect with my grey Ninja shirt, when I get cold I throw this on and I can still be a Ninja.

item.title: Comment on Lords of Strategy by Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: This is the most bombastic hoodie in this shop, it's soft and has the sly WooThemes ninja on it. Why wouldn't you buy this?
item.content:encoded: This is the most bombastic hoodie in this shop, it’s soft and has the sly WooThemes ninja on it. Why wouldn’t you buy this?

item.title: Comment on Ship Your Idea by Ryan
item.dc:creator: Ryan
item.description: This hoodie gets me lots of looks while out in public, I got the blue one and it's awesome. Not sure if people are looking at my hoodie only, or also at my rocking bod.
item.content:encoded: This hoodie gets me lots of looks while out in public, I got the blue one and it’s awesome. Not sure if people are looking at my hoodie only, or also at my rocking bod.
